snippet.title: CARROT: Pancakes and Waffles | Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The second installment in the “CARROT” series. Take place in the same world as the first one, packed with familiar faces, and also some new ones.

A tiny slice of life game where you live a peaceful day in a whimsical hand-painted world.  

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1986430/CARROT_Pancakes_and_Waffles/
https://chasefox.itch.io/carrot-pancakes-waffles

https://chasefoxart.tumblr.com/
https://twitter.com/chasefoxart
https://www.patreon.com/chasefoxart
